Question
========
What is one reason to add a covariate to your ANOVA?

Answerlist
----------
* Wanting to increase the within-group error variance.
* Wanting to decrease the within-group error variance.
* Interested in the interaction between the covariate and the dependent variable.
* Interest in the interaction between two categorical variables.
